_header: By a forest as I gan walk
_description: ‘Merci Passith Riȝtwisnes’, a dialogue between a sinner and Mercy — twenty 8-line stanzas

BLAdd31042.First Lines: By one foreste als I gan walkeWith owtten a paleys appon a ley…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …With ȝoure freschly face vs fedeAnd thus Mercy passes Rightwysnes
